title: DC US Attorney Ed Martin's Calendar

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Any and all available calendars, daily itineraries, and schedules of activities for interim U.S. Attorney for the District of Columbia Ed Martin between Jan. 21, 2025 and April 4, 2025.

For the purposes of this request, this includes official government accounts and private accounts, such as Google Calendar, iCalendar, and Microsoft Outlook, used for government business.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

CJ Ciaramella

communications.subject: Pennsylvania Right to Know Act Request: Records Request
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Pennsylvania Right to Know Act, I hereby request the following records:

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Pennsylvania Right to Know Act, I hereby request the following records:

A monthly breakdown of the number of officers and staff assigned to Lehigh County Jail for the years 2022, 2023, and 2024.

Copies of all policies, guidelines, or directives regarding staffing levels at Lehigh County Jail.

The total number of inmate injuries and deaths recorded annually in 2022, 2023, and 2024, including any available documentation categorizing these incidents.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Rylan Listman
